trans-unit.source: Provides a safe handle that can be used by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供了可被下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象使用的安全句柄。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用非托管的代码的权限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 表示调用非托管的代码的权限。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的预先存在的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Using <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> returns an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> 返回无效句柄。

trans-unit.source: The parent handle of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> 的父句柄。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptHandle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 已关闭。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: Releases a handle used by a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) object.
trans-unit.target: 释放由下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象使用的句柄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功释放了句柄，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases a native handle used by a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) object.
trans-unit.target: 释放由下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象使用的本机句柄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功释放了句柄，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
